title: Oil slides in volatile trading as upcoming U.S.-Iran talks revive de-escalation hopes
summary_full: Oil prices fell on Thursday after Washington and Tehran agreed to hold talks in Oman on Friday, even as differences persist over the scope of the discussions.
summary_public: Oil prices fell on Thursday after Washington and Tehran agreed to hold talks in Oman on Friday, even as differences persist over the scope of the discussions.
